Alexis Zorbas [1964/x264/EN,FR,IT,AC3/EN,FR,IT,PT,AR,BU,HU,PO,NL,GRsubs]
.
.
[img]http://s26.postimg.org/szso3vewp/Al_Zor00.jpg[/img]
.
.
[b]Storyline[/b]
An aimless Englishman finds he has a small inheritance on a Greek island. His joyless existence is disturbed when he meets Zorba, a middle aged Greek with a real lust for life. As he discovers the earthy pleasures of Greece, the Englishman finds his view on life changing. 
.
.
[b]IMDb:[/b] - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0057831/?ref_=nv_sr_1
.
.

Yorgo Voyagis........Pavlo (as George Voyadjis)
Takis Emmanuel.......Manolakas

George P. Cosmatos...Acne Faced Boy
